baseapp_install.Msg: The app can be easily installed on your device homepage. On iOS, use Safari to load app, click the share button and then select Add to Home Screen. On Android, use Chrome to load app, click Install. On Windows, using Edge or Chrome, load app, open browser menu and select Install SetsApp. On MacOS, use Safari to load app, click the install button in the address bar.

baseapp_refresh.Msg: To get the lastest version of the calculator in your browser, click on the Update App button. This will clear any current calculation.

baseapp_aboutus.Msg: This App was designed by BanquetConsulting and implemented by Insight Sciences Corporation.

baseapp_updatingapplicationmsg.Msg: Hang on, we are loading an update!

baseapp_updatingassetmsg.Msg: Hang on, we are loading the asset data!
